statements: SELECT camera_id, camera_name, timestamp, duration FROM camera_footage;
SELECT * FROM camera_footage WHERE incident_flag = TRUE;
SELECT camera_name, timestamp, footage_url FROM camera_footage WHERE resolution = '1080p';
SELECT timestamp, duration FROM camera_footage ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT camera_id, resolution, incident_flag FROM camera_footage WHERE duration > 60;
SELECT camera_name, footage_url, resolution FROM camera_footage WHERE duration > 60 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM camera_footage WHERE incident_flag = TRUE ORDER BY duration ASC
SELECT camera_id, timestamp, footage_url FROM camera_footage WHERE resolution = '1080p' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59'
SELECT camera_name, timestamp, incident_flag FROM camera_footage WHERE duration < 30 AND incident_flag IS NOT NULL ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT DISTINCT camera_id, resolution FROM camera_footage WHERE timestamp >= '2022-03-01 00:00:00'
SELECT * FROM camera_footage;
SELECT camera_id, timestamp FROM camera_footage ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM camera_footage WHERE camera_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT incident_id, incident_type FROM incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Theft';
SELECT * FROM incidents ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM camera_footage WHERE timestamp > NOW() ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT camera_id, footage_url FROM camera_footage WHERE camera_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, description FROM incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Theft' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM camera_footage cf JOIN incidents i ON cf.camera_id = i.camera_id WHERE i.incident_type = 'Vandalism' AND i.timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT camera_id, COUNT(incident_id) AS num_incidents FROM incidents GROUP BY camera_id HAVING num_incidents > 3 ORDER BY num_incidents DESC
SELECT * FROM Cameras;
SELECT camera_id, location_name, camera_type FROM Cameras;
SELECT * FROM CameraFootage WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
SELECT camera_id, timestamp, description FROM Incidents ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT camera_id, resolution FROM Cameras WHERE location_name LIKE 'Downtown%';
SELECT camera_id, location_name FROM Cameras WHERE camera_type='Outdoor' ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM CameraFootage WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT camera_id, timestamp FROM Incidents WHERE description LIKE '%theft%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location_name, resolution FROM Cameras WHERE resolution='4K';
SELECT incident_id, timestamp, description FROM Incidents WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM SecurityCamera;
SELECT location, resolution FROM SecurityCamera ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT footage_id, camera_id, timestamp FROM SurveillanceFootage WHERE duration > INTERVAL '1 hour';
SELECT log_id, description FROM IncidentLog WHERE timestamp >= TIMESTAMP '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM AlertNotification ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM SecurityCamera WHERE location = 'Entrance';
SELECT footage_id, timestamp, duration FROM SurveillanceFootage WHERE duration > INTERVAL '1 hour';

SELECT camera_id, location, COUNT(footage_id) AS num_footages FROM SecurityCamera LEFT JOIN SurveillanceFootage ON SecurityCamera.camera_id = SurveillanceFootage.camera_id GROUP BY SecurityCamera.camera_id;
SELECT log_id, description FROM IncidentLog WHERE timestamp BETWEEN TIMESTAMP '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND TIMESTAMP '2021-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT alert_id, message FROM AlertNotification ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM SecurityCameraFootage
SELECT camera_id, timestamp FROM SecurityCameraFootage WHERE footage_id = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM IoTDevice WHERE status = TRUE
SELECT device_name, location FROM IoTDevice WHERE device_id = 2
SELECT * FROM IncidentResolution ORDER BY resolution_id DESC
SELECT * FROM SecurityCameraFootage WHERE footage_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT incident_id, timestamp, description FROM Incident WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM IoTDevice WHERE status = TRUE
SELECT team_name, leader_id FROM SurveillanceTeam WHERE leader_id IS NOT NULL
SELECT resolution_id, incident_id FROM IncidentResolution ORDER BY resolution_id ASC
